name: File Store
description: Telegram bot to store your telegram files

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

DB_CHANNEL_ID.description: give me the telegram channel ID here (better this should be private channel)

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: Your bot updates channel like To Watch Next Subtitles Bot Update (username without @ for forcesub). (Leave empty it you don't want to add)

OWNER_ID.description: give your telegram user id here

AUTH_USERS.description: Add authorized userids if u are using IS_PRIVATE

IS_PRIVATE.description: Add True if you want to use as Private
